string.value: Did #b#p2091002##k finish making the medicine for #p2071006#? I better go see #p2091002# right now...
#p2091002# seemed very concerned about #p2071006#'s injury, and worked hard to make #b#t4031555##k for it. Now all I need to do is deliver this medicine to #b#p2071006##k...

I managed to deliver the medicine to #p2071006#. People from all over the area seem to really go out of their way to help #p2071006# out. Hopefully it manages to feed off the love from those people and be able to fly high once more...!
Oh, are you here to deliver the medicines for #p2071006#? Wow, you really seem to be one great human being! You are worthy of being a Master, as a matter of fact!
A number of #bmedicines#k are included in this to not only fix its wings, but also its occasional amnesia. Please deliver this to #b#p2071006##k, and tell it #p2091002# say HI!
Do you still have something to do here at #m250000000#? Then we should take care of that now.

Hey, you're that great person that sent me #m250000000#'s best wishes! Wow, hello there! Are you here to travel #m222000000#? What? #p2091001# asked #p2091002# for the medicine? Wow... for you to go all the way to #m222000000# just to deliver a medicine... thank you soooo much!
Once the wings are fixed, I don't care about what I have to do, but I better head over to #m250000000#! I miss each and everyone there...
Have you not gone to #b#p2071006##k, yet? Since #p2071006# seems to be hurt, please hurry so it can buy some time for recovery.
How come you haven't gone to #m250000000#? You must be traveling through #m222000000#.

What? You misplaced the #b#t4031555##k that's for #b#p2071006##k? Sigh... you should have been more careful, considering it's a long-distance delivery! I'll make you another one since it's for #p2071006#, but please be careful.
